explains: adj. 归化的；入籍的；[动]自然化的；驯化的
v. 使自然化；接受……入国籍；采纳（naturalize 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.en: The other 90% have fit into their environments and are considered naturalized.
sentences.cn: 另外90%的人已经适应了他们的环境，且已经被认定入籍了。

sentences.en: He emigrated to the United States when he was seventeen years old, and was naturalized on his twentieth birthday.
sentences.cn: 他十七岁时移居美国，二十岁生日时就入籍了。

sentences.en: Einstein was naturalized American nationality in 1940.
sentences.cn: 爱因斯坦于1940年加入美国国籍。
